favourite.article: Praise the Lord! Excellent melody to sing over and over this wonderful verse. It leads me to touch and enjoy our dear Lord.
Really like this song as we are singing the very longing of God. I was reminded of Adam speaking of Eve as bone of my bone and flesh of my flesh....this is sweet. I think it could be sung as a round.
This verse song is so sweet :) Praise the Lord that the New Jerusalem is not a material city, but a corporate person! It's the bride of Christ as His counterpart!
